channel.title: I Love .NET
channel.description: This is a .NET knowledge sharing platform with live demos crafted by developers for developers with love.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Improve Data Security with Cryptographically Secure Random Generation in .NET
item.description: Master secure random number generation in .NET: avoid predictable System.Random, implement secure OTPs, create bulletproof GUIDs, and protect against randomness attacks.
item.a10:content: Master secure random number generation in .NET: avoid predictable System.Random, implement secure OTPs, create bulletproof GUIDs, and protect against randomness attacks.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Improve Data Security with Hashing Techniques in .NET
item.description: Master secure hashing in .NET: password hashing with ASP.NET Core Identity, SHA256 with salt and pepper, and digital signatures for non-repudiation.
item.a10:content: Master secure hashing in .NET: password hashing with ASP.NET Core Identity, SHA256 with salt and pepper, and digital signatures for non-repudiation.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Replacing MediatR with a Custom Mediator (Dynamic Dispatch) in WEB API
item.description: How to replace MediatR with a small, custom mediator implementation using dynamic dispatch and automatic handler registration.
item.a10:content: How to replace MediatR with a small, custom mediator implementation using dynamic dispatch and automatic handler registration.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Improve Data Security by Preventing Excessive Data Exposure in .NET
item.description: How to prevent excessive data exposure in .NET APIs using DTOs, role-based authorization, and secure backups. Practical steps for GDPR compliance.
item.a10:content: How to prevent excessive data exposure in .NET APIs using DTOs, role-based authorization, and secure backups. Practical steps for GDPR compliance.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Improve Data Security by Doing a Secure User Data Download in .NET
item.description: Learn how to securely implement GDPR-compliant user data export in .NET, including encryption, authorization, and best practices for protecting PII.
item.a10:content: Learn how to securely implement GDPR-compliant user data export in .NET, including encryption, authorization, and best practices for protecting PII.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
item.title: Improve Data Security with Right to be Forgotten in .NET

item.a10:content: How to implement the right to be forgotten in .NET: deleting or anonymizing user data across databases, logs, backups, and more.

item.author: abdulrahman.smsi+ilovedotnet@gmail.com
